column3: “Dragon's Breath lives up to its name. Very thin buds with lots of orange/yellow hairs that follow the shape/outline of the bud. Maybe it was the trim job or maybe they name originates from the resemblance between the hairs and actual fire. Overall, an incredible sense of well being and mental calmness washes over after just a few hits. While it still remains very potently a sativa, the energy delivered was not overwh...”

“BROOO
Okay, my friend and I smoked this in my car, we smoked three bowls but the third one took us an hour because we couldn't stop tripping our tits off, 10/10”
“Toasted :P Lol amazing strain <3 GREEEEEAAAAAAAT for cartoons and chilling with a homie :) pretty rare in my opinion. A must try if you happen to come by it :) completely worth it :)”
“Had this bud and was pleased to stay it is best i've had in a long time. Nice relaxed head high that will let you be productive.”

“San Francisco Cannabis Cup Winner!!!! a nice tasty blend of Jack Herer (50%), northern lights (37.5%) and Skunk Sativa (12.5%). Known for it's clear headed and effective properties. Literally picked this up on a trip to LA on 4/20 of this year... still have 2 big nugs left :) very hard to come by, super rare. 10/10”
“Hard smile face”
“Great medicine for depression and anxiety. tonight was my first experience with the dragons breath and I was not disappointed. nice calming soothing effect.”
“this strain was a super happy strain it made everything great and Damm it's a good kissing strain.”
“My boyfriend and I are currently high rn off this amazing dragons breath. It doesn't make you sleepy it gets you going!  If you come by it I suggest you get it.”

“This strain is something! The nugs are coated in Trichomes and have a very distinct skunk smell that comes from the nugs! The high from this is amazing everything goes by in like a frame by frame type of visual, and time goes by pretty slow other then that the high is a total wreck!”
“If you were wondering if I was transported to a realm where winged beast roam freely after taking a bowl to the dome, then yes, yes you are correct. Top notch, Scientists. Keep up the good work.”
“good had it in pt. intense immediate high. come down in 15 mins. muscle relaxing. stable and poppy. causing short term memory loss. laughs. great for long breakfast mornings”
“This bud made my right big toe twitch for two hours straight!!! It was incredible”
“when our powers combine, I am captain planet...oh wait 🤔 two strains I have enjoyed separately now together in a very awesome way!”
“Upbeat relaxed happy mood! Helps with chronic back pain!”
“Delightful”
“Upbeat relaxed happy mood! Helps with chronic back pain!”

“Dragon's Breath, Five Star. Initially it appears to be made up of very big fluffy nugs in texture, deceiving to the eyes, they were actually quite dense when the meds were broken down. Prior to rolling up, in the breakdown I noticed nugs were sticky but still manageable enough to do so without a grinder. The scent is dominated by a nostalgic pungency and an earthly taste, equipped with an energetic buzz that can be e...”
“This bud made my right big toe twitch for two hours straight!!! It was incredible”
“Yeah it's pretty chill”
“best strain ever... northern lights was originally my favorite until I tried dragon's breath.”
“when our powers combine, I am captain planet...oh wait 🤔 two strains I have enjoyed separately now together in a very awesome way!”
“Delightful”
“I had this strain years ago and it is unforgettable The smell alone lets you know just how good it is Its just so hard to find but you ever do you definitely should try it”

“A super euphoric high, definitely. And I can't help but mention that my arousal level went through the roof when smoking this. The earthy taste is pleasant, and it's a nice smoke while having a glass of wine or a cocktail.”
“Great stuff. Awesome taste.”
“really good feel, nice taste and smell”

“I dig it.. this weed hit me like stupid high. Totally freakin agree no depression or anxiety after smoking this. Perfext for that long traffic drive back home after work. #LosAngeles but definitely CottonMouth with this one”
“A truly great hybrid. Energetic and focused with a great uplifted feeling. Meltaway stress and anxiety instantly. Hunger definitely kicks in. Great flavor and smoke.”
“A little bit of anxiety on the front end, but this is an amazing sativa that really opens all the senses and lifts you up.”
“Wow!! try it!!”

“Love the earthiness and the sweetness of this pot!
5 stars”
“Good taste love the smell one of the better tasting buds. Covered in crystals, this chronic gives me a Short strong High does not last very long but hits hard.”

“This Strain is very good for relaxing and being happy it is a very instant Body/Head high it's wonderful before bed and very amazing when you smoke in the morning It's one of them strains that u can pretty much enjoy anytime of the day I definitely recommend trying this.”
“Great pain/stress reliever”
“love in vape pen”
“it's okay but I've had better. i probably won't buy again”
“Relaxing high, not too heavy you can still go out and be social be feel very mellow. Highly recommend”
“A cross of northern lights and jack herer taking over your body within minutes will relieve you from daily stress and leave you craving tropical drinks and late night adventures with your friends”
“A very clear headed sativa that is great for energizing, being productive, and relieving anxiety.”
“I loved the smell of this strain taste to me wasn't that outstanding but the buds were absolutely beautiful!”
“amazing strain barely smoked it 30 min ago”
“My first impression was a bit paranoic after Dragon's Breath but then I felt exteamly relaxed and didn't care at all what's going on around me, right after I smoked it.”
“Awesome. Definitely one of my favorites of all time gave me exactly the high I was looking for.  It smells amazing like fruity gas and hits like a train. have fun and enjoy this wonderful flower!”
“very relaxing high, made me feel very uplifted. no anxiety or dry mouth. will probably smoke again!”
“A real uplifting stain, it provides me with an energetic feeling ain't with an improved mood. I didn't feel sleepy while smoking it so I would consider it more of a day time stain.”
“won of my favorites”

“Oh man, I love love love this stuff. fantastic medicine for depression! I feel uplifted and happy with this, also too care of my constant spasms I have daily. the taste is also amazing. My new favorite day smoke 🤙”
“Great stuff. Awesome taste.”
“Super great strain for going out in public.  Keeps your head clear, but makes life enjoyable.”

“this stuff is amazing. it helped my back pain, anxiety, helps me get up and around with a little wake n bake. I compare it's potency to blue rhino or blue dream and I never say that. stuffs good, I'd recommend getting it if you run into it. especially if you have depression or pain.”

“Love the earthiness and the sweetness of this pot!
5 stars”
“I had this strain years ago and it is unforgettable The smell alone lets you know just how good it is Its just so hard to find but you ever do you definitely should try it”

“With a name like dragons breath, i was expecting a super overpowering experience. But this was a very balanced high. Very smooth smoke. Lots of pain releasing body buzz. Didn’t force me straight to sleep.”

“Great sativa excellent taste and decent high I find myself smoking more often when I'm
Smoking this weed high doesn't last long I feel but could be just with me”
“I can’t stop doing jazz hands 🤗”

“High as a kite right now thanks to Dragons Breath had this on my list of just try strains I gotta say I do not regret putting this strain on my list amazing high not to heavy when smoking this strain no headaches and it's very relaxing”

“Definitely a sativa dominant.  I'm an indica guy, but I thought I'd give it a try.  First few minutes were a nice mind-high, I felt great & motivated.  After about 30 minutes, I'd notice that I was super tired physically, but that my mind was racing and was super energetic.  I was still too physically tired to do anything.  Weird combination that made me a little uncomfortable, I wouldn't recommend to anyone that has...”
“Wow!! try it!!”
“A truly great hybrid. Energetic and focused with a great uplifted feeling. Meltaway stress and anxiety instantly. Hunger definitely kicks in. Great flavor and smoke.”
“really good feel, nice taste and smell”

“A super euphoric high, definitely. And I can't help but mention that my arousal level went through the roof when smoking this. The earthy taste is pleasant, and it's a nice smoke while having a glass of wine or a cocktail.”

“I dig it.. this weed hit me like stupid high. Totally freakin agree no depression or anxiety after smoking this. Perfext for that long traffic drive back home after work. #LosAngeles but definitely CottonMouth with this one”
“A little bit of anxiety on the front end, but this is an amazing sativa that really opens all the senses and lifts you up.”
“Did some research and this strain had 20% thc in it, making it one of the best strains when making baked goods. The body high lingered for hours and hit me in about 15mins.”
“Very earthy flavor nice and relaxing great for pain great high”
“spicy”
“Didn't like this high. It was overwhelming and didn't feel nice.”
“I'd give it a 7 out of 10. i found it to be less than i was hoping for.  smokes well and has some good color.”
“more hype than hypnotic psychosis..its not horrible...but save your $$$”
